SKT_FIRST.name: Ray of Destruction
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and increases <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. The damage dealt is inversely proportional to the number of targets. If it is the caster's turn, obtains <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>Revelation of Truth (Unique Resource)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and increases <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000028_1_2] turn(s)</color>. The damage dealt is inversely proportional to the number of targets. If it is the caster's turn, obtains <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000028_1_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>Revelation of Truth (Unique Resource)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다. 자신의 턴이라면 <color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 진리의 계시</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 획득합니다. 대상의 수가 적을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。自分のターンの場合、<color=#28d9ed>【固有資源:真理の啓示】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>獲得する。対象が少ないほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_SECOND.name: Mana Converter
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and reduces the duration of <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> on each target that took damage by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>. Obtains <color=#28d9ed>2</color> <color=#28d9ed>Revelation of Truth (Unique Resource)</color> if used during the caster's turn. The damage dealt is inversely proportional to the number of targets.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Gains 2 additional Revelation of Truth\nIncreases damage
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 【真理の啓示】獲得量+2\nダメージUP

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nIncreases Invulnerability duration by 1 turn
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n無敵+1ターン

description: Attacks all enemies and reduces the duration of <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> on each target that took damage by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>. Obtains <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000028_2_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>Revelation of Truth (Unique Resource)</color> if used during the caster's turn. The damage dealt is inversely proportional to the number of targets.
SKT_SECOND.name_jp: マナ・エクスプロージョン
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color> 지속 턴을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소시킵니다. 자신의 턴이라면 <color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 진리의 계시</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>2개</color> 획득합니다. 대상의 수가 적을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少させる。自分のターンの場合、<color=#28d9ed>【固有資源:真理の啓示】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2個</color>獲得する。対象が少ないほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Bless All Mages
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: <color=#28d9ed>Requires 5 Revelations of Truth (Unique Resource) to be used.</color>\nAttacks all enemies. Damage dealt is inversely proportional to the number of targets. This attack penetrates <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense.
description: <color=#28d9ed>Requires [Buff_V_2000028_3_1] Revelations of Truth (Unique Resource) to be used.</color>\nAttacks all enemies. Damage dealt is inversely proportional to the number of targets. This attack penetrates <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense.
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: マジシャンズ・ナビゲート
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: <color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 진리의 계시 5개 보유 시 사용 가능합니다.</color>\n적 전체를 공격하고 대상의 수가 적을수록 피해가 증가합니다. 해당 공격 시 관통력이 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: このスキルは<color=#28d9ed>【固有資源:真理の啓示】が5個ある場合、使用できる。</color>\n敵全体にダメージを与え、対象が少ないほどダメージがUPする。このスキルは、貫通力が<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>UPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Action Points of the caster and the next Skill Chain caster by <color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Action Points of the caster and the next Skill Chain caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000028_chain_1_1]</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000028_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신과 다음 스킬 체인 수행자의 AP를 <color=#28d9ed>25</color> 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>이 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、自分と次のチェーンスキル参加者のAPを<color=#28d9ed>25</color>獲得する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>が<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPする。
